51db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]}},"version":1}

depositFunds(address,uint256).details: Allows a client to deposit funds for a project and register its parameters. Requires KYC level from ForteCompliance to be >= REQUIRED_KYC_LEVEL.

params._milestoneCount: Number of milestones to split the payment into.

getProject(uint256).details: Returns all details of a project.

isKYCApproved(address).details: Returns true if the user's KYC level is sufficient.

refundClient(uint256).details: Refunds the client if no milestone has been released.

releaseAfterEvent(uint256).details: Allows oracle or automation to release a milestone after a specific event (e.g., concert ended).

releaseMilestone(uint256).details: Releases a milestone payment to the artist. Meant to be OVERRIDDEN by child contracts (ArtVault).

setForteCompliance(address).details: Sets the Forte compliance contract address.
